name: MetaOption LLC
description:
MetaOption LLC is a renowned Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, based in New Jersey, USA, and providing innovative IT Solutions & Services to its clients, based in different corners of the globe. We own 9+ years of huge experience in providing ‘end-to-end’ IT development services to more than 100 clients, coming from diverse business sectors.
The title of ‘Microsoft Gold Certified Partner’ proves our expertise and dedication to provide the best available IT solutions & services. All our services pass through high quality checks, which ensure that they stand upon the global standards.
We have a team of certified in-house engineers and developers, which innovates the top quality solutions and services for our clients. Our IT solutions & services strengthen our clients to face all types of challenges, which they get in their enterprises’ or organization’s various day-to-day business operational works.
Some of the major areas & technologies, where we excel are-
Microsoft Dynamics CRM, NAV
Microsoft SharePoint, Office 365
Android, iOS, BlackBerry, Windows App/Games Development
Software Development Services, PHP, Java
IT Staffing Services & Solutions
Amazon Web Services, Windows Azure Cloud Services, Product Engineering Services
Open Source & More
